name: Wrong Turn (Stefano Cagnani V3)
description:
This footage is owned by the Clermont County - Ohio Police  
In 1998 this footage was found, shot by a certain Christof E. 
in the woods of the Clermont valley in Ohio. 
His body was never found, but the police searched for 
those responsible from the video. 
The searches were never completed.
Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
This game is nearly based on the "Wrong Turn: Foundation" movie.
But story is mine!
----BACK FROM THE DEAD----- BONUS GAME--------
The second link is one of my favourite game I published months ago!
Hope you like it and good Halloween!
